name: Crimson Energy Fizz
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the vodka and cranberry juice and shake well. Strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with Redbull and stir gently to mix.
backstory: This vibrant cocktail combines the bold energy of Redbull with the fruity sweetness of cranberry, inspired by the lively spirit of festive nights out.
